name: Dimensions (JorenC)
description:
Dimensions

Dimensions is a mindbending 3D puzzel game where you switch between dimensions and try to reach the exit.  You can solve the puzzels by going through portals, shooting portals, lasers and much more! 

Have fun and good luck!

Install instructions

1) Download the zip file. 

2) Unpack the zip file. 

3) Launch the .exe
